RE: License #: CN220269295
Northpointe Behavioral Healthcare Systems
715 Pyle Dr
Kingsford, MI 49802
Dear Ms. Hellman:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
01/13/2021. The study has determined substantial compliance with applicable licensing
statutes and rules. Therefore, your certificate of approval license is renewed.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact Claudia Triestram, Area Manager at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,
Don Collier, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
Suite 11
701 S. Elmwood
Traverse City, MI 49684
(231) 342-5326

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes, and does not have
a DHHS contract or fall under MISEP reporting requirements.
The agency had no regulated activity during the licensing period, except for the
supervision of a seventeen-year-old youth in adult foster care, in compliance with
Public Act 116, which DCWL does not regulate.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
Technical Assistance was not required.
V. CONSULTATION
Consultation was not requested.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period. The agency was not required to submit any corrective action plans not
related to maltreatment during this licensing period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
January 18, 2021
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
